name: BLOQOUT 2
description:
Thanks for playing Bloqout 2!

Match 4 Bloqs of the same color to earn diamonds! Bloqout 2 is an incredibly fun and addictive puzzle game where your entire brain is challenged to do the impossible! Increase your matching and memory skills by playing Bloqout 2!

Compare to Cubicks!

Features

-Hundreds of custom made Bloqouts

-12 Brain challenging game modes

-20+ special Bloqs

-15+ Changeable hand crafted skin packs

-10+ Changeable backgrounds

-Achievements

-In game shop

-Dynamic point system

If you like Bloqout 2, be sure to like Divided By Zero Laboratories on Facebook and Twitter. Don't like Bloqout 2? Tell us why ASAP and we will do our best to make sure it's a game you love! Whatever you do, always remember that Bloqout 2 is the puzzle game designed to keep you having fun!
